title: Best selling books in France 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Units sold for 10 number of Titles.
The Units sold is highest at Title Un appartement à ParisGuillaume Musso and lowest at Title Couleurs de l'incendiePierre Lemaitre.
The difference of Units sold between the highest and lowest Title is 287700.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Title, and Units sold in each Title on the y axis.
The Units sold is appeared to be the highest at Title Un appartement à ParisGuillaume Musso and lowest at Title Couleurs de l'incendiePierre Lemaitre.

The Units sold is appeared to be the highest at Title Un appartement à ParisGuillaume Musso and lowest at Title Couleurs de l'incendiePierre Lemaitre.
Title Ta deuxième vie commence quand tu comprends que tu n'en as qu'uneR. Giordano has the second highest value for Units sold.

Title Un appartement à ParisGuillaume Musso is higher than any other Titles with value 590000.0, followed by Ta deuxième vie commence quand tu comprends que tu n'en as qu'uneR. Giordano, and La jeune fille et la nuitGuillaume Musso. Down to Title Couleurs de l'incendiePierre Lemaitre with the lowest value 302300.0.

The Units sold is 4083000.0 if we add up values of all Titles.
